title: Spicy jerk chicken thighs with peppers and rice
description: Chicken thighs are super cheap and full of flavour, coat with a jerk spice paste for a flavour sensation.
ingredients: 2cm/1 inch piece fresh root ginger, roughly chopped
1 yellow scotch bonnet chilli, chopped or 1 tsp dried chilli flakes
1 tsp coriander seeds or ½ tsp ground coriander
2 cloves, or a pinch of ground cloves
salt and freshly ground black pepper
